nodes.bodyText: I'm thinking the constructor should be public as well so that applications can use it in their own authentication providers.

Now that this is going to be for general use, will you please add validation checks in the constructor here, similar to:
Assert.notNull(name, "name cannot be null");
Same for attributes or just name ?

Since this class is just becoming generally available in 5.4, it makes more sense to indicate that in the @since. Otherwise, developers may wonder why they can't find DefaultSaml2AuthenticatedPrincipal in 5.3, for example.
Will you please change this to @since 5.4?
You are also welcome to add yourself as an author, if you like.
